title: Comment on "2 children among 7 people wounded: 12 violent hours in New Orleans"
content:
An 11-year-old boy was shot in the hip late Tuesday in the 5100 block of Lakeview Court, NOPD said. The boy was taken by EMS to a local hospital, police said. A neighbor, who declined to give her name, said she heard five or six gunshots, "might have been more." The neighbor said she has lived in the area for nearly 30 years and is tired of contending with crime.
A 22-year-old man was shot late Tuesday (Jan. 17) in the 6000 block of Beechcraft Street, in the Pines Village area of New Orleans East, NOPD said. The man had been shot "multiple times," police said. Crime-scene technicians photographed the exterior of a home near the dim-lit intersection of Beechcraft and Skyview Drive. A cluster of yellow evidence cones were placed behind a car parked in the driveway. Several evidence cones also dotted a nearby driveway and front yard on Skyview Drive.
A 27-year-old woman was shot in the leg early Wednesday morning in the second gun incident in the Pines Village area overnight, NOPD said. Her condition was not immediately available. Police reported the shooting at 2:15 a.m. in the 4800 block of Majestic Oaks Drive. The woman was taken to a hospital to be treated.
